entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , La Sarre
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:08 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Light snow. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning this morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clearing. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023
